body: The error is because you have a glazing surface which has an empty space inside. Such an opening is not allowed in EnergyPlus. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/WnPbYMT2cxdFg*Ho**hv73ZaaujPaw*qIdk8fttG-ID0L8RQSKQOa7I3RJOVY9vX-G3*ITiY7Tg*gVUl*8kmtmd-I3Jow5I1/donutshapeglazing.jpg) I'm not sure what you're trying to do but if you're trying just to create a daylighting model then I would model a geometry like this surface by surface and add the right material to each surface. You don't need to create child surfaces. In case you want to use the model for Energy modeling then you should consider limitations of energy modeling. You can break down this surface into two U-shaped surface for instance. Mostapha
